title: Kim Kardashian's friend La La Anthony owns tons of Yeezys
text:
La La Anthony has 'lost count' of the number of pairs of Yeezys she owns.

The 38-year-old star admitted her obsession with Kanye West's footwear line is a 'little crazy' but she's thankful her friend, the rapper's wife Kim Kardashian West always gives her the scoop on what's coming next in the range.

'I'm a sneakerhead, so I literally have every single pair of Yeezys,' she told People.

Too many! La La Anthony has 'lost count' of the number of pairs of Yeezys she owns she told People

Gal pals: The 38-year-old star admitted her obsession with Kanye West's footwear line is a 'little crazy' but she's thankful her friend, the rapper's wife Kim Kardashian West always gives her the scoop on what's coming next in the range. Seen with Kim in September

'I lost count a long time ago.

'We always talk about [Yeezy] stuff. And then I'll just see them at my house in a different colourwave, which is always cool. I have so many. It's a little crazy.'

Kim is among the friends whose shoe collections the Beverly Hills, 90210 star admires, though she admits few people's compare to her own.

She said: 'I love Kim's shoes. I also think Ciara and Kelly Rowland have some great shoes. But I have to be honest, my shoe closet is nothing to play with.'

These are not Yeezys! Here she is seen in a pair of Nikes as she cheats on her Yeezys

Kim talk: Kim is among the friends whose shoe collections the 'Beverly Hills, 90210' star admires, though she admits few people's compare to her own. She said: 'I love Kim's shoes. I also think Ciara and Kelly Rowland have some great shoes. But I have to be honest, my shoe closet is nothing to play with'

But La La would love to raid Jennifer Lopez's closet because she thinks the Hustlers star can 'do no wrong' in the style stakes.

She said: 'I mean, who doesn't want to raid Jennifer Lopez's entire closet? She can absolutely do no wrong. So she's definitely on my list.'

The 'Two Can Play That Game' star attended QVC's 26th FFANY Shoes on Sale Gala last week to support Breast Cancer Awareness and was delighted to be involved in the 'special' event, which marked QVC.com donating 80% of profits from the sale of over 70,000 pairs of shoes being donated to breast cancer research.

She said: 'The gala is so special just because you're supporting these women and showing that you're there for them.

'I think it goes a lot further than people even know. Just walking around the room, you can feel the energy. It's people honouring women that they've lost, the women who have survived and the women who are still fighting.'
description: The 38-year-old star admitted her obsession with Kanye West's footwear line is a 'little crazy' but she's thankful her friend, the rapper's wife Kim always gives her the scoop.
